description:
Do you like to prank your friends and parents? Have you ever dreamed to crack window, break light bulbs, fluorescent lamps or glass blocks? Did you love to break glass things in your childhood? If yes then this app is for you and it's FREE !!!  

Game includes 4 different categories: 

1. Image Breaker -You can import any picture, photo of your boss for example, and then sweetly break his portrait.  

2. Glass Blocks - Break glass blocks by tapping on it. It's a little bit hard to break blocks but you can do it. Look out! Don't harm your fingers with broken glasses :) 

3. Light Bulb - Go now and break as many light bulbs as you wish. It's so easy to do with this app and it sounds are really excitable. 

4. Fluorescent Lamps - Break as many daylight lamps as you can. Try relaxing with it and get more pleasure with realistic sound effects :) 

App Highlights:

- Cracks & Breaks have amazing graphics and realistic sound effects
- You can simple upgrade to PRO version. Add 5 more and entertaining categories 
- App supports multi-touch and you can crack & break in multiple points

Download this awesome in a hurry game and don’t forget to leave us a positive review!
releaseNotes:
- The inconvenience regarding getting back to Menu has been solved. 
Shake your device and tap "Menu" button when you want to go back.
- Minor improvements
